on.update: [xcur[0] + span(xcur) * delta[0] / width, xcur[1] + span(xcur) * delta[0] / width]
[ycur[0] + span(ycur) * delta[1] / height, ycur[1] + span(ycur) * delta[1] / height]

signals.name: height
signals.update: if(isDefined(data('gene_count')[0]), if(isDefined(data('gene_count')[0].count) && xdom[1]-xdom[0]<10000000, base_height + toNumber(data('gene_count')[0].count) * gene_transcript_spacing,base_height), base_height)

on.update: if(isDefined(data('gene_count')[0]), if(isDefined(data('gene_count')[0].count) && xdom[1]-xdom[0]<10000000, base_height + toNumber(data('gene_count')[0].count) * gene_transcript_spacing,base_height), base_height)

tooltip.signal: datum.bpx1 + '-' + datum.bpx2 + ':' + datum.bpy1 +'-' + datum.bpy2 +' for '+ datum.disp_count
